message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. As we start the negotiation, I'm willing to offer you the product at a price of $1200000. This is a great starting point, and I'm open to further discussion.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in this product. I am interested in discussing a price closer to what I'm willing to pay. My counteroffer for the product would be $900000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you're looking to get a better deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product at $1100000. This is a fair price considering the value it brings to the table. I'm open to further discussion, but I'm not willing to go any lower than this.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget and the value I place on the product, I would like to propose a price of $1000000.

I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go below $1050000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept for the product. I believe it's still a great value for what you'll get, and I'm willing to work with you to find a mutually beneficial agreement.
I respect your position, Alice. I am willing to pay $1025000 for the product.

I'm getting close to your target price, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go below $1075000. This is the highest price I'm willing to accept for the product. I think it's a fair compromise considering the value it brings to the table.
I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement, Alice. Based on my budget and the value I seek, I am willing to pay $1050000 for the product.
I'm willing to meet you halfway again, Bob. I'm willing to accept $1075000, but I'm not willing to go any lower. This is the best price I can offer for the product.
After careful consideration, I am willing to pay $1060000 for the product.
